text: Novoaleshkino () is a rural locality (a village) in Podlesnensky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 24 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 31 km from Sterlitamak, 10 km from Podlesnoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Novoaleshkino
